Package com.codepoetics.fluvius.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    An Action takes a Scratchpad, performs some operation, and returns an updated Scratchpad.
    Condition
    A Condition tests a Scratchpad, returning true or false depending on the Scratchpad's state.
    Conditional<V>
    A value with an attached Condition.
    Flow<T>
    A Flow which takes values from a Scratchpad, and provides a new value to be written into the Scratchpad.
    FlowVisitor<V>
    Visits a Flow and all of its sub-flows to construct a value, such as an Action or FlowDescription, which represents something we might want to do with the Flow, e.g.
    Operation<T>
    An Operation accepts a Scratchpad, and returns a value of some type.
